projects.title: Options Pricing
projects.description: Applying High Performance Computing techniques to compute the prices of American and European options using different pricing methods

projects.title: Principal Component Analysis
projects.description: Explore PCA to discern whether low-dimensional structure exists in a set of data and to find good representations of the data in that subspace

projects.title: K-means Clustering
projects.description: Implementing the k-means++ algorithm using it to cluster Iris dataset from the UCI Machine Learning Repository

projects.title: Non-Linear Classifiers
projects.description: Experiment with non-linear classifiers: Boosted Decision Trees (i.e., boosting with decision trees as weak learner) and Random Forests

projects.title: Linear Regression
projects.description: A simple linear regression model with a modified loss function and try to solve it with Gradient Descant (GD) and Stochastic Gradient Descant (SGD)

projects.title: K-NN Algorithm
projects.description: Use the k-NN algorithm to find the optimal value for the number of neighbors k, using the implementation in scikit-learn

projects.title: Exploratory Data Analysis
projects.description: Basic data analysis on a simple data set (UCI Adult data set) using pandas package in Python

projects.title: Virtual Memory Paging
projects.description: Implemented an access control mechanism to perform translations / accesses for when pages are already in memory, and fault over to the software when the page is not resident

projects.title: Memory Allocation
projects.description: Implemented the Buddy System and Slab Allocation for memory allocation / de-allocation, and reduced Internal Fragmentation

projects.title: Thread Schedulers with Semaphore Synchronization
projects.description: Designed four multi-threaded schedulers (FCFS, SRTF, PBS, MLFQ) with preemption and synchronization for a uni-processor environment

projects.title: Recursive Decent Parser
projects.description: Developed a Lexical Analyzer and a Syntactic Analyzer which parses the tokens given by the Lexer using the Recursive Descent technique for a restricted for of SQL

projects.title: Matrix Multiplication
projects.description: Comparison of Sequential, OpenMP Parallel and MPI Parallel code that accomplishes Matrix Multiplication

projects.title: Monte Carlo Simulation
projects.description: A serial, a multithreaded and two parallel programs for the estimation of Pi using the Monte Carlo Method. Parallelized using OpenMP and MPI

projects.title: 32-bit CPU
projects.description: Created an 32-bit processor using the pipelining technique for building a fast CPU

projects.title: Lion LaunchPad App
projects.description: An app that provides an accessible way for members to visualize, track and lend out inventory items, and perform other exigencies of the SLO

projects.title: Sequential Caching Web Proxy
projects.description: A Sequential Caching Web Proxy with Range Support

projects.title: Unix Shell
projects.description: Created a simple Unix Shell that supports job control, allows users to move jobs back and forth between the back-ground and foreground, and to change the process state of a job

projects.title: Text Based Game
projects.description: Developed a text-based game using Model View Controller Design Pattern that lets you explore campus and pick up different items via the console
